verses.verse: And Mosheh <WH4872> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> these words <WH1697> unto all Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I am an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> this day <WH3117>; I can <WH3201> <WH8799> no more go out <WH3318> <WH8800> and come in <WH935> <WH8800>: also the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH559> <WH8804> unto me, Thou shalt not go over <WH5674> <WH8799> this Yarden <WH3383>.

The YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, he will go over <WH5674> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee, and he will destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> thee, and thou shalt possess <WH3423> <WH8804> them: and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, he shall go over <WH5674> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee, as the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall do <WH6213> <WH8804> unto them as he did <WH6213> <WH8804> to Sichon <WH5511> and to Og <WH5747>, kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and unto the land <WH776> of them, whom he destroyed <WH8045> <WH8689>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall give them up <WH5414> <WH8804> before your face <WH6440>, that ye may do <WH6213> <WH8804> unto them according unto all the Mitzvot <WH4687> which I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you.

Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>, fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, nor be afraid <WH6206> <WH8799> of them <WH6440>: for the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, he it is that doth go <WH1980> <WH8802> with thee; he will not fail <WH7503> <WH8686> thee, nor forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> thee.

And Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him in the sight <WH5869> of all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>: for thou must go <WH935> <WH8799> with this people <WH5971> unto the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them; and thou shalt cause them to inherit <WH5157> <WH8686> it.

And the YY <WH3068>, he it is that doth go <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail <WH7503> <WH8686> thee, neither forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> thee: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, neither be dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> this Torah <WH8451>, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> it unto the Kohanim <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, which bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068>, and unto all the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, At the end <WH7093> of every seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>, in the solemnity <WH4150> of the year <WH8141> of release <WH8059>, in the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>,

When all Yisra'EL <WH3478> is come <WH935> <WH8800> to appear <WH7200> <WH8736> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>, thou shalt read <WH7121> <WH8799> this Torah <WH8451> before all Yisra'EL <WH3478> in their hearing <WH241>.

Gater <WH6950> the people <WH5971> together <WH6950> <WH8685>, men <WH582>, and women <WH802>, and children <WH2945>, and thy stranger <WH1616> that is within thy gates <WH8179>, that they may hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, and that they may learn <WH3925> <WH8799>, and fear <WH3372> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and observe <WH8104> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all the words <WH1697> of this Torah <WH8451>:

And that their children <WH1121>, which have not known <WH3045> <WH8804> any thing, may hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, and learn <WH3925> <WH8804> to fear <WH3372> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, as long as <WH3117> ye live <WH2416> in the land <WH127> whither ye go over <WH5674> <WH8802> Yarden <WH3383> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Behold, thy days <WH3117> approach <WH7126> <WH8804> that thou must die <WH4191> <WH8800>: call <WH7121> <WH8798> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and present <WH3320> <WH8690> yourselves in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, that I may give him a charge <WH6680> <WH8762>. And Mosheh <WH4872> and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> went <WH3212> <WH8799>, and presented <WH3320> <WH8691> themselves in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> in the tabernacle <WH168> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud <WH6051>: and the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> over the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Behold, thou shalt sleep <WH7901> <WH8802> with thy fathers <WH1>; and this people <WH5971> will rise up <WH6965> <WH8804>, and go a whoring <WH2181> <WH8804> after <WH310> the 'elohim <WH430> of the strangers <WH5236> of the land <WH776>, whither they go <WH935> <WH8802> to be among <WH7130> them, and will forsake <WH5800> <WH8804> me, and break <WH6565> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> which I have made <WH3772> <WH8804> with them.

Then my anger <WH639> shall be kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against them in that day <WH3117>, and I will forsake <WH5800> <WH8804> them, and I will hide <WH5641> <WH8689> my face <WH6440> from them, and they shall be devoured <WH398> <WH8800>, and many <WH7227> evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> shall befall <WH4672> <WH8804> them; so that they will say <WH559> <WH8804> in that day <WH3117>, Are not these evils <WH7451> come <WH4672> <WH8804> upon us, because our 'Elohim <WH430> is not among <WH7130> us?

And I will surely <WH5641> <WH8687> hide <WH5641> <WH8686> my face <WH6440> in that day <WH3117> for all the evils <WH7451> which they shall have wrought <WH6213> <WH8804>, in that <WH3588> they are turned <WH6437> <WH8804> unto other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>.

Now therefore write <WH3789> <WH8798> ye this song <WH7892> for you, and teach <WH3925> <WH8761> it the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: put <WH7760> <WH8798> it in their mouths <WH6310>, that this song <WH7892> may be a witness <WH5707> for me against the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For when I shall have brought <WH935> <WH8686> them into the land <WH127> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1>, that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>; and they shall have eaten <WH398> <WH8804> and filled <WH7646> <WH8804> themselves, and waxen fat <WH1878> <WH8804>; then will they turn <WH6437> <WH8804> unto other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> them, and provoke <WH5006> <WH8765> me, and break <WH6565> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285>.

And it shall come to pass, when many <WH7227> evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> are befallen <WH4672> <WH8799> them, that this song <WH7892> shall testify <WH6030> <WH8804> against <WH6440> them as a witness <WH5707>; for it shall not be forgotten <WH7911> <WH8735> out of the mouths <WH6310> of their seed <WH2233>: for I know <WH3045> <WH8804> their imagination <WH3336> which they go about <WH6213> <WH8802>, even now <WH3117>, before I have brought <WH935> <WH8686> them into the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738>.
Mosheh <WH4872> therefore wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> this song <WH7892> the same day <WH3117>, and taught <WH3925> <WH8762> it the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he gave Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> a charge <WH6680> <WH8762>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>: for thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> into the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them: and I will be with thee.

And it came to pass, when Mosheh <WH4872> had made an end <WH3615> <WH8763> of writing <WH3789> <WH8800> the words <WH1697> of this Torah <WH8451> in a book <WH5612>, until they were finished <WH8552> <WH8800>,
That Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the L'vi'im <WH3881>, which bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8800> this book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451>, and put <WH7760> <WH8804> it in the side <WH6654> of the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, that it may be there for a witness <WH5707> against thee.

For I know <WH3045> <WH8804> thy rebellion <WH4805>, and thy stiff <WH7186> neck <WH6203>: behold, while I am yet alive <WH2416> with you this day <WH3117>, ye have been rebellious <WH4784> <WH8688> against the YY <WH3068>; and how much more after <WH310> my death <WH4194> ?

Gater <WH6950> <WH8685> unto me all the elders <WH2205> of your tribes <WH7626>, and your officers <WH7860> <WH8802>, that I may speak <WH1696> <WH8762> these words <WH1697> in their ears <WH241>, and call <WH5749> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to record <WH5749> <WH8686> against them.

For I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that after <WH310> my death <WH4194> ye will utterly <WH7843> <WH8687> corrupt <WH7843> <WH8686> yourselves, and turn aside <WH5493> <WH8804> from the way <WH1870> which I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you; and evil <WH7451> will befall <WH7122> <WH8804> you in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>; because ye will do <WH6213> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, to provoke him to anger <WH3707> <WH8687> through the work <WH4639> of your hands <WH3027>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> in the ears <WH241> of all the congregation <WH6951> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> the words <WH1697> of this song <WH7892>, until they were ended <WH8552> <WH8800>.
